The 2024 Computation + Journalism Symposium

Hosted by Northeastern University on October 25-27, this conference will bring together top minds like Julia Angwin, Aaron Sankin, and Alan Mislove to explore the intersection of technology and journalism. Engage in panels, keynotes, and workshops addressing AI, media bias, local news, and more.
